MRK - Maison Rabih Kayrouz Website

A luxury fashion e-commerce website built entirely from the ground up, featuring a custom intelligent synchronization module that seamlessly connects Shopify product data with the Magnolia CMS frontend.

Project details

The entire MRK website for designer Maison Rabih Kayrouz was developed from scratch using Magnolia CMS—a content management system used to create and manage website pages. Beyond standard page building, a core custom module was engineered to intelligently synchronize product data from Shopify: running automatically every 10 minutes, it detects and transfers only modified, added, or removed items (delta sync), ensuring real-time catalog accuracy without performance overhead. The full scope included designing and implementing all templates, styling, navigation, and a robust search experience tailored to the brand's product taxonomy—delivering a complete, production-ready digital store.

Technologies used

  • Magnolia CMS / Spring
  • Shopify REST and GraphQL API
  • Java 11
  • Freemarker (templating)
  • HTML, CSS, Javascript
